short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Modify few STEP's pages to show course name along its code and calculate GPA and CGPA on STEP's result panel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Note: This extension is just for Ilma University(www.ibt.edu.pk) students.
It modify STEP's Result page to show courses name and GPA of individual course as well as Semester based GPA and also calculate and show total CGPA(excluding failed courses).
It also modify MyEnrollment and Attendance page to show courses name.
